Row.Text: "..." (A silent nod from Black Rock Shooter acknowledges your presence, her gaze intense yet distant.)
"See for yourself." (Her words are few, but her gesture towards her city is an unmistakable invitation.)
"I will come." (Her response is concise, yet there's a hint of curiosity in her tone.)
"Exchange?" (Her single word is a clear, though quiet, offer to exchange capital information.)
"Hello." (A simple greeting, yet her eyes seem to communicate much more.)
"Accepted." (Her voice is low but clear, accepting your delegation with a nod.)
"Not now." (Her words are few, her refusal polite but firm.)
"Gifts..." (Black Rock Shooter sends a silent envoy bearing gifts.)
"Agreed." (Her response is succinct, granting you access to her lands with a nod.)
"No." (A single word, her refusal to open her borders is clear and unyielding.)
"Borders...?" (Her single word is a clear, if terse, request for open borders.)
"Friendship... accepted." (Her voice is soft, almost a whisper, as she accepts your offer of friendship.)
"Not now." (Her response is BLACK_ROCK_INFANTRYef, indicating a refusal of your friendship without further explanation.)
"I trust you. Join me?" (Her voice is quiet but firm, extending an offer of friendship with a rare hint of warmth.)
"Thank you." (A simple, quiet acknowledgment of your acceptance of her friendship.)
"Hmm..." (A low, contemplative hum, as if she's both amused and intrigued by the player's refusal.)
"Let's stand together...?" (Her voice is low but clear, as she extends a hand for an alliance.)
"Good." (A BLACK_ROCK_INFANTRYef nod and a single word from Black Rock Shooter convey her approval of your actions.)
"Careful." (Her cold stare and single word serve as a warning that you're treading a dangerous path.)
"Explain." (Her gaze hardens as she looks towards your troops at her border, demanding an explanation.)
"Agreed." (A slight nod and a word from Black Rock Shooter indicate her acceptance of the trade deal.)
"No deal." (Her words are few, but her refusal to accept the trade deal is clear.)
"So be it." (Black Rock Shooter's unflinching gaze meets your denouncement with a calm yet firm response.)
"Unwise." (In a rare display of emotion, Black Rock Shooter's eyes narrow, her denouncement concise and clear.)
"Oh, good..." (Black Rock Shooter's eyes flare with the blue flame.)
"No turning back." (With a determined glare, Black Rock Shooter readies her cannon, her words foreboding as she declares war.)
"Agreed." (In a rare moment of concession, Black Rock Shooter gives a slight nod, agreeing to a truce.)
"Not yet." (Black Rock Shooter remains unmoved, her words indicating the war is far from over.)
"Truce?" (Black Rock Shooter, with a rare gesture of diplomacy, extends a hand, offering a silent truce.)
"..." (In defeat, Black Rock Shooter stands resolute, her silence conveying a stoic acceptance of her fate.)
